s: I will make my Australian Shepherd ... make the mud disappear but it definitely absorbs water quickly. I am going to be purchasing a second one for garage door. I love that it has a non-slip backing and is super low profile. I never had a problem with excessive lint or any off smells. ... t: Amazon.com: OLANLY Dog Door Mat for Muddy Paws 30x20, Absorbs Moisture and Dirt, Absorbent Non-Slip Washable Doormat, Quick Dry Chenille Mud Mat for Dogs, Entry Indoor Entryway Carpet for Inside Floor, Grey : Pet Supplies
s: I have been very happy with these mats. I’ve washed a couple times since purchasing a month ago— they still look brand new and do not slip on the floor at all (I once washed a “washable rug” and the anti slip backing failed after that). These definitely do a good job of cutting down on what my pets drag in from outside. It’s not a miracle worker so if they’re coated, you’ll still have to wipe off paws, but it definitely reduces the amount of dirt and mud...
